messages.subject: Re: Help!!! Seeking all other SINGLE unschooling moms,grandparents,etc. in OREGON!
messages.msgSnippet: Call me:  503-692-2088.  We can go to the commons, or the community park, or the new library (have you been yet?  Seems kind of blah to me) or Atfalati or....?
messages.messageBody:
Call me: 503-692-2088. We can go to the commons, or the community
park, or the new library (have you been yet? Seems kind of blah to me)
or Atfalati or....?
My 20 and 12 yo girls would love to play with a 5 yo girl. And I know
a 5 yo boy here in Tualatin who's main playmates are his 9yo sister and
my 12 yo.
Mary

--- In AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com, "amyrotola" <amyrotola@...>
wrote:
>
> My daughter will be 5yold this September and we still have not
> connected with others like ourselves! We desperatley need and crave
the
> support and love from others like us-being a rare breed I think we
need
> all the help we can get! Even meeting once a month will be well worth
> the drive! So, speak up guys! I know you're out there....
> Thanks and God Bless everyone,
> Amy and Amelie
> Tualatin, OR
>

messages.subject: Help!!! Seeking all other SINGLE unschooling moms,grandparents,etc. in OREGON!
messages.msgSnippet: My daughter will be 5yold this September and we still have not connected with others like ourselves! We desperatley need and crave the support and love from
messages.messageBody:
My daughter will be 5yold this September and we still have not
connected with others like ourselves! We desperatley need and crave the
support and love from others like us-being a rare breed I think we need
all the help we can get! Even meeting once a month will be well worth
the drive! So, speak up guys! I know you're out there....
Thanks and God Bless everyone,
Amy and Amelie
Tualatin, OR
